name: Infiknight
description:
Infiknight a 2D infinite side scroller where you play as a brave knight on a never-ending journey. Your mission is to attack enemies, jump through platforms and survive as long as you can 

Controls

Spacebar - jump (for windows)

jump button - Jump

Attack button - attack

This game is playable on  both android and windows

"Fun game" - monke from discord "

10/10 The game is good I love slime" - sleepy

 "8.5/10 Game is great but it has no pity system and the Gacha is rigged but I will make it 10 if Emilia was there." -denver

"Cool game but lack balls" - aki my girlfriend (real)

 Note: the reviews are definitely not made by my friends

I'm still learning unity and this is my 2nd game I'd be really happy if u guys will give me feedback or criticism to improve further
